attributes.action: To Recall the MP of Lichfield district and call for a bi election
attributes.additional_details:
To Forse Lichfield mp to vacate there seat in Parliament and call for a bi election.
Due to ignoring there duties to their constituents

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
